description: This dashboard visualizes key APK Router metrics, capturing both downstream and upstream data trends..

panels.description: Amount of dynamic memory allocated by the Envoy server for its operations.
panels.title: Allocated Memory

panels.description: Total heap size of the Envoy server
panels.title: Heap Size

panels.description: Total number of requests received from downstream clients
panels.title: Downstream Requests Total

panels.description: Total number of connections that have been accepted by the listener from downstream clients
panels.title: Downstream Connections Total

panels.description: Percentile latency of request times from downstream clients over the last 30 minutes
panels.title: Downstream Latency

panels.description: Number of active connections that have been established with the downstream
panels.title: Downstream Active Connections

panels.description: The total number of requests made to the upstream service
panels.title: Upstream Requests Total

panels.description: Total number of connections that have been established to the upstream
panels.title: Upstream Connections Total

panels.description: Percentile latency of request times to upstream over the last 30 minutes
panels.title: Upstream Latency

panels.description: Number of active connections that have been established to the upstream
panels.title: Upstream Active Connections

panels.description: Count of upstream requests for a specific cluster with HTTP response codes in the 2xx class
panels.title: Upstream 2xx Responses Total

panels.description: Count of upstream requests for a specific cluster with HTTP response codes in the 3xx class
panels.title: Upstream 3xx Responses Total

panels.description: Count of upstream requests for a specific cluster with HTTP response codes in the 4xx class
panels.title: Upstream 4xx Responses Total

panels.description: Count of upstream requests for a specific cluster with HTTP response codes in the 5xx class
panels.title: Upstream 5xx Responses Total

panels.description: Average number of total endpoints (or members) for each cluster
panels.title: Total Endpoints

panels.description: Average number of healthy endpoints (or members) across clusters
panels.title: Healthy Endpoints

panels.description: Average number of unhealthy endpoints (or members) across clusters
panels.title: Unhealthy Endpoints

panels.description: The ratio of healthy endpoints to total endpoints, on average, for each cluster
panels.title: Endpoint Percentage Health

title: APK Router
